original_text: And when you hear the sound of marching in the tops of the balsam trees, then go out to battle, for God has gone out before you to strike down the army of the Philistines.”
korean_text: 뽕나무 꼭대기에서 걸음 걷는 소리가 들리거든 곧 나가서 싸우라 너보다 하나님이 앞서 나아가서 블레셋 사람들의 군대를 치리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: And when you hear the sound of marching
in the tops of the balsam trees,
for God has gone out before you
to strike down the army of the Philistines.”
